DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate if an orally disintegrating tablet of sildenafil will have similar pharmacokinetic properties when given with food and without food.
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics Of Sildenafil Orally Disintegrating Tablet Formulation Given With Or Without Food.
DOC.criteria: Otherwise healthy male subjects age 45 years or older with or without erectile dysfunction. Body Mass Index (BMI) of 17.5 to 32.5 kg/m2. Signed Informed Consent. Evidence or history of clinically significant abnormalities Have baseline orthostatic hypotension Positive drug screen, excessive alcohol and tobacco use
DOC.keyword: Bioavailability Food Effect Oral Dissolving Tablet (ODT)
